type.description: Property. NGSI Entity Type: It has to be WasteContainerError

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refWasteContainer.description: Relationship. The WasteContainer which this model belongs to. Model:'http://schema.org/URL'

errorStart.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Date'. Date at which the error started

errorEnd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Date'. Date at which the error was resolved

errorCode.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. Code of the error
